name: Che Lagarto Hostel Paraty

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: At first sight it looks a nice hostel. We had a 3 person room which was really great with airco, refridgerator, nice bathroom. They even offer a massage etc.
reviews.title: Nice hostel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: At some point we couldn't order caipirinha because the bartender run out of glasses...
reviews.title: Great stay a Paraty Che Lagarto

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Later on he closed the bar because he also run out of beer. At some point it looked like he had the beer.
reviews.title: Seven Days in Paraty

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Think twice what clothes you give when you use the laundry service.
reviews.title: Good location/friendly helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got some damaged clothes back.
reviews.title: Receptionist with curly brown hair speaking castellano/spanish was a HUGE mistake at that place!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: I spent 2 nights and I had a great time.
reviews.title: Great time and friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff is very friendly and international.
reviews.title: A very nice stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is great, just a few steps and you are in the historical center.
reviews.title: Nice hostel but disappointed they overcharged us and staff rifled through our belongings

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And if you arrive by bus is closer to the station.
reviews.title: A beautiful setting in a garden, great atmosphere!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Easy to meet people from around the world, especially during the night meals by the bar/pool.
reviews.title: Great atmosphere, decent rooms, good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good tours, helpful staff, decent food, clean room. Loses a star cos food was only ok, and breakfast buffet wasn't replenished enough, lots of queues for food here, a bit unorganised. All the same great place. Was told to keep the noise down at 10:45pm one evening, could have been dropped to 3 for that, but 4/5 is about right I think.
reviews.title: Solid hostel, worth a visit.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great hostel. Good sized double room and hot shower, great cheap dinners, good info on activities, friendly staff who speak perfect English and a lovely front yard. The wifi didn’t work for us at all but did seem to for other people in the common areas (doesn’t reach the private rooms). Good location, close to everything especially bus station and supermarket. The kitchen was tiny and not well equipped but not many people seemed to use it, probably because of the good dinners on offer. We had to ask three times to get towels and blankets but otherwise the service was great!
reviews.title: Worth a stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for4 nights in May in a private room. One of the best I stayed at in Brazil! Good clean hostel with decent enough breakfast, good value themed dinners, great location, very social fun atmoshphere in bar area. I would definately recommend the BBQ Buffet. Only draw back was the tiny kitchen you have to line up to use, also double check your laundry in you put it to get it washed there, ours came back colour stained.
reviews.title: Great Place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed in a private double for two nights and weren't impressed with the accommodation. It's a great location (really near the old town), a great place to meet people and has so much potential but unfortunately, it's let down by whoever is managing it! If you're crashing for a night, maybe it's ok but if you're staying longer I would look elsewhere.
reviews.title: It's a great place to meet people but a bad place to stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The negatives:
reviews.title: Great Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: What does it say about a hostel that has flatscreen TVs advertising overpriced tours and transfers but refuses to provide towels -- even at a price -- to dorm sleepers? What does it say about a hostel that uses cheap electric shower heads in its bathrooms instead of higher-quality hot water heaters? What does it say about a hostel that uses electronic key cards for rooms that are tired and dirty? What does it say about a hostel that provides 'clean' -- but with lots of yellow stains -- linens? What does it say about a hostel that advertises salad with its perhaps fairly-priced -- but not cheap -- dinner and then provides a single piece of brown lettuce? What does it say about a hostel whose bathrooms are covered in mold?
reviews.title: Not meeting basic cleanliness standards

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: Well, all of these things say that this hostel puts short-term profit ahead of a truly quality experience for guests. Che Lagarto -- as a major Latin American hostel chain -- should be more than capable of providing the basics for guests: clean linens, decent showers and facilities in good repair.
reviews.title: Very disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: What are the few good things? Well, most of the staff is really nice, especially the evening bartender. The breakfast is decent. It's also just a couple minutes from the bus station, but Paraty is so small that you can really walk to any hostel in the centre without breaking a sweat.
reviews.title: Good Hostel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: All of the above considered, however, in a town -- Paraty -- without a truly outstanding budget option, Che Lagarto may be the best of a not-so-good lot for travelers.
reviews.title: Fantastic!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013
reviews.text: I stayed in this hostel for 3 nights. The dormitory and matress had a terrible smell probably due to the humidity in the room. There was only one small window which we could open and the AC wasn't working properly. The general feeling I had in that room was one of claustrophobia!
reviews.title: Good place

description: The new hostel in Paraty will have both private and shared rooms, with private bath and air conditioning in superior apartments. As always it will have the best common areas, tv room, bar and the cool atmosphere that characterizes us for you to enjoy your trip around South America with most kind, entertaining and professional staff.
